title: why can i not use my 25$ top card
body: i can not use my 25$ voucher top up it is saying i am using the wrong region or something i am from NZ any suggestions why this is not working ?

replies.body: Hmmmm that's no good. Certain types of cards can be region specific, meaning they won't work in other countries. Since you're in NZ and playing on the North American region, that might be what's going wrong. Reach out to our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with some screenshots of that card and they'll be able to help you out ^_^!
